Name: Mortal Dark
About the game: Mortal Dark is a first person action-adventure retro game where you have to fight and solve some puzzles in order to survive and escape from a twisted world. Survive Do you think is easy to stay alive?! Not really, especially when you are surrounded by hungry creatures and the ammo is limited. Explore Explore the world in order to unlock new areas and find clues that will help you solve the puzzles, but be careful, many thinks lurks inside the dark. Puzzles Around the world you will find puzzles, even though are simple, solving them might be difficult when you are chased.
Meta Title: Mortal Dark: Sep 2, 2022, Lazy Hamster and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mortal Dark? Check out the release date (Sep 2, 2022), developer insights from Lazy Hamster, and a complete game summary.
